definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: My days of roughing it in hostels or fleabag motels are over.
sentences.chinese: 在招待所和廉價汽車旅館度假的日子已經過去了。

sentences.english: A lot of motels lie beside the turnpike.
sentences.chinese: 很多汽車旅館都位於付費公路旁邊。
不，我們住在汽車旅館裏。

sentences.english: Motel business went to pot when the new highway was built.
sentences.chinese: 新的公路造好後，這家汽車旅館的生意蕭條了。

sentences.english: In the USA, this would be more like a 1 STAR MOTEL.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，這樣的酒店則更象個一星級的汽車旅館。
飛機，火車，還有霍比特人汽車旅館？

sentences.english: A:I think we should try to find a reasonable motel tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我想今晚我們要設法找一個不太貴的汽車旅館。

sentences.english: The travelers lodged in motels every night.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊者每晚在汽車旅館投宿。

sentences.english: Some are branded as motels, even though they don't offer parking.
sentences.chinese: 一些品牌以汽車旅館自居，儘管他們並不提供停車場。

sentences.english: Sara anxiously goes to the motel to see Gretchen, who asks to be anally .
sentences.chinese: 她煩燥地來到了一個汽車旅館，來會見格雷琴。

sentences.english: The first one I went into was in a motel bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次是在一家汽車旅館的浴室。

sentences.english: Are there any other motels near here?
sentences.chinese: 附近還有其他的汽車旅館嗎？

sentences.english: Many city hotels and diversely located motels fall into this group.
sentences.chinese: 許多城市旅館和各色各樣汽車旅館屬於這一類。

sentences.english: Even eccentric old motels and gas stations have made the list.
sentences.chinese: 即使偏心老汽車旅館和加油站都榜上有名。

sentences.english: When we got back to the motel, the director got out of the car and walked with me part of the way.
sentences.chinese: 我們到了汽車旅館時，理事長下車陪我走了一段路。

sentences.english: Bookings at pay-by-the-hour "love motels" have also risen sharply.
sentences.chinese: 以小時計費的“情侶汽車旅館”訂房率也大幅上升。

definition: variant of 帕塔亞|帕塔亚[Pa4 ta3 ya4]/Pattaya or Phatthaya city in Chon Buri province of east Thailand
Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)
